item.title:
“Summertime Sadness” by Lana Del Rey has reached 900 MILLION streams on Spotify.
It’s her most-streamed song on the platform.
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
‘Loud’ by @Rihanna has reached 3 BILLION streams on Spotify.
It’s her 4th album to achieve this.
item.author: popcrave

item.title: #TheLittleMermaid is currently the #1 movie in the world.
item.author: popcrave

item.title: Halle Bailey and Jonah Hauer-King on the set of #TheLittleMermaid.
item.author: popcrave

item.title: Fans notice that Ariana Grande has archived over 4,000 of her Instagram posts.
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
‘Midnights’ by Taylor Swift is projected to return to #1 on the US albums chart with 225–275K units, @HITSDD reports.
It would mark the album’s 6th week at #1.
item.author: popcrave
